channel.title: First Kiss
channel.description:
Okay to start off, I'm 14. So yeah.
I just now, like 10 minutes ago, got my first kiss.
It wasn't like a kiss, but like a make out, sort of. It was 10 seconds long.
I think I did a horrible fucking job of kissing her, so any advice about kissing is appreciated. This thread is also about discussing your first kiss.
Also, is it a bad thing that I posted this here before telling anyone I know IRL?

item.title: First Kiss
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:106, topic:373080"][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=469098.msg3444889#msg3444889 date=1293352961]

[quote author=`Aaron link=topic=469098.msg3444887#msg3444887 date=1293352855]

I can’t believe some people don’t ever get girlfriends or never date, it makes my heart hurt to watch it all.

Not really though.

Lol, last date i’ve been on, tbh, was nearly 3 years ago. What do I remember the most? The food lmfao, the girl I was with at the time turned out to be a complete slut after i broke her in LOL

I don’t enjoy dating, i enjoy sex only.
[/quote]sad… user.

Coming from a virgin? I do what i want.
[/quote]Yo dude it’s just my opinion. Well, it’s also text-book user definition, but you nomsain.

ps abstinence has nothing to do with what a user means

I rephrased my meaningless comment.[/quote]Ok. Well we’re going to have to agree to disagree on this one mate

Read full topic

item.title: First Kiss
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:95, topic:373080”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=469098.msg3430661#msg3430661 date=1292298766]

[quote author=rip4d link=topic=469098.msg3430653#msg3430653 date=1292298447]

There you go being shy, and depressive.
It seems like you have confidence issues. Just go for her.
If she says no, who cares? You’ll find better. Just dont say you didn’t try.
[/quote]Well I’m not like that. At all. I never try to find better, because in my mind they are the best… Especially when you’ve been wanting to ask them out for over a year…

I love being the only one in my family who has not had to ask a girl out lmfao. Had 4 gf’s, and all have asked me. A bit of joy in that, as it makes me feel a bit better about myself, but a bit disappointing, as I wont have the pleasure of being shot down until I finally ask someone out lol.
[/quote]Pleasure? Niga please.

Anyways, I’m gonna head off to bed guys.
Wish me luck tomorrow…or the next day…or whenever I get the courage to do it.[/quote]

You’ll be fine dude, but good luck anyways.

Read full topic

Wish me luck tomorrow…or the next day…or whenever I get the courage to do it.

item.title: First Kiss
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:89, topic:373080”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=469098.msg3430631#msg3430631 date=1292297435]
Its better to try and have her say no, than to wait, and let someone beat you to her.
[/quote]

Forsure man. The best thing that ever happened to me personally for dealing with girls is when I started being completely direct with them. Well that and finding the G-spot, but that’s a different conversation entirely

And I don’t mean direct where you be an asshole and just walk up to a girl and say “Wanna fuck?” Although I have heard success stories with that technique. But direct where you don’t waste time and don’t play games. Leave that stuff for the women to do, god knows they love to.[/quote]

Loled. My friends and i were playing truth or dare (cause were cool like that) and i dared him to say “Wanna Fuck?” to this really hot chick. He went and asked and ended up getting lucky that night… It was halarious.

Read full topic

And I don’t mean direct where you be an asshole and just walk up to a girl and say “Wanna fuck?” Although I have heard success stories with that technique. But direct where you don’t waste time and don’t play games. Leave that stuff for the women to do, god knows they love to.

item.title: First Kiss
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Don’t be shy. Most girls want guys to make moves, so they don’t have to wait.
Just do something and let her know how you feel. If she doesn’t feel the same, oh well. At least you tried.[/quote]

Thanks for the advice. I was a huge pussy and to scared to make a move, so she made the move for the kiss, lol.

[quote=“orcashark, post:86, topic:373080”]I got my first kiss at the age of 11, and made out my first time when i was 13. Im actually still with the girl i first made out with now and im 15. Ill give you some tips,
Try not to breathe too hard through your nose while you do, i know its hard but itl make the moment feel better.
ALWAYS keep your eyes closed until its over.
When your backing away, back off slowly, dont just pull away, cause then she will think she did something wrong.
Try to just nibble, and if your feeling confident, try to tickle her lips very gently with your tongue, if she doesnt do anything then stop doing it, if she responds try to have fun with your tongues.[/quote]

There was some tongue action in there:)

Read full topic

I’ve just always been the kind of guy to feel bad about things… I clearly saw that one of my friends liked her, and he seemed to be doing a better job than me, so I figured he deserved her

item.title: First Kiss
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

I got my first kiss at the age of 11, and made out my first time when i was 13. Im actually still with the girl i first made out with now and im 15. Ill give you some tips,
Try not to breathe too hard through your nose while you do, i know its hard but itl make the moment feel better.
ALWAYS keep your eyes closed until its over.
When your backing away, back off slowly, dont just pull away, cause then she will think she did something wrong.
Try to just nibble, and if your feeling confident, try to tickle her lips very gently with your tongue, if she doesnt do anything then stop doing it, if she responds try to have fun with your tongues.

I Vain I:

Also, there’s no point in trying to flame about someone’s looks, when you have seen all the comments on your pictures in the ‘IRL Pictures’ thread.

Ouch…

Read full topic
